data.expected_result: The picture should either be uploaded as .heic or automatically be converted to .jpeg by iOS itself
data.short_description: Pictures taken from iOS 11 (using the new HEIF format) upload as "unknown" to Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on iOS 11 - (Optional step if you have this option disabled, go to Settings -> Camera -> Formats and choose the High Efficiency option) - Take a picture using the native Camera app - Upload the picture you've just taken to Discord
